column1: Agent: 5000 EMI pending hai. Borrower: Kal Sunday hai parso pakka 5000 pay kar dunga.
Borrower: Wrong number hai, koi Rahul nahi hai yahan.
Borrower: Main poora loan close karna chahta hoon, foreclose kara do.
Borrower: Sir meri naukri chali gayi hai pichhle mahine. Nayi job March mein start hogi.
Agent: EMI bounce hai aapka. Borrower: Haan sir, hospital mein tha, medical emergency thi, sara paisa lag gaya.
Borrower: Hello hello. Agent: Hello, aap sun pa rahe hain? Borrower: Hello? Haan haan. Agent: Aapka EMI bounce hai, kab pay karenge? Borrower: Agle hafte 3000 jama kar dunga pakka.
Agent: Hello Borrower: Hello, main uska bhai baat kar raha hoon, woh ghar pe nahi hai.
Agent: Payment kab karenge sir? Borrower: Dekhunga. Agent: Sir koi date? Borrower: Sochunga.
Agent: Hello? [Silence] Agent: Hello? [Silence] Agent: Koi awaaz nahi aa rahi, call disconnect karta hoon.
Borrower: Mujhe loan settlement karna hai, kuch discount milega? Agent: Haan sir, settlement ke options hain.
